column4: Hrrm, I am not sure who to assign this bug to :-  https://://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/cdrtools/+bug/70098 -- lpease tell me what procedure this sort of things goes thrugh // howto get it looked at / what I can do to help / etc. ;-)
Somebady please tell we the correct channel in which to discuss Ubuntu-bugs ;-)
well, there is a #ubuntu-bugs, but you reported it, and can really only wait, pay someone to work on it, or work on it yourself.
I see... so I am not supposetd to assign it to the package maintainer or contact the maintainer ?
